snippet: Martin Fleisher of New York City; Michael Kamil of Holmdel, N.J.; Jay Borker of Greenwich, Conn.; and Doug Doub of West Hartford, Conn., won the Sunday Swiss Teams at the District 3 Autumn Leaf Regional in Danbury, Conn.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played at District 3 Autumn Leaf Regional in Danbury, Conn.
lead_paragraph: Martin Fleisher of New York City; Michael Kamil of Holmdel, N.J.; Jay Borker of Greenwich, Conn.; and Doug Doub of West Hartford, Conn., won the Sunday Swiss Teams at the District 3 Autumn Leaf Regional in Danbury, Conn.
